00035 //    number error for Microsoft Visual C++.

00040 #ifndef KMEANS_H
00041 #define KMEANS_H
00042 
00043 #include "KM_ANN.h"            // basic definitions
00044 
00045 using namespace std;            // make standard names available
00046 
00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 //  Important strings
00049 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 const string KMshortName    = "KMlocal";
00051 const string KMlongName        = "KMlocal (k-means clustering by local search)";
00052 const string KMversion        = "1.7";
00053 const string KMversionCmt   = "(Use at your own risk)";
00054 const string KMcopyright    = "David M. Mount";
00055 const string KMlatestRev    = "August 10, 2005";
00056 
00057 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 //  Type definitions
00059 //    Although data points and centers are of the same type
00060 //    as a KMpoint, we distinguish these types here for the
00061 //    sake of making the code a little easier to interpret.
00062 //
00063 //    KMdataPoint    Used for k-means data points.
00064 //    KMcenter    Used for k-means center points.
00065 //    KMpoint        Used for any other points and intermediate
00066 //            results used in the program.
00067 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 
00069 typedef KMpoint        KMdataPoint;    // data point
00070 typedef KMpoint        KMcenter;    // center point
00071 
00072 typedef KMpointArray    KMdataArray;    // array of data points
00073 typedef KMpointArray    KMcenterArray;    // array of center
00074 
00075 typedef KMidx        KMdataIdx;    // a data point index
00076 typedef KMidx        KMctrIdx;    // a center point index
00077 typedef KMdataIdx    *KMdatIdxArray;    // array of data indices
00078 typedef KMctrIdx    *KMctrIdxArray;    // array of center indices
00079 
00080 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 //  Global constants
00082 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 
00084 const double KM_ERR     = 1E-6;    // epsilon (for floating compares)
00085 const double KM_HUGE     = DBL_MAX;    // huge double value
00086 const int    KM_HUGE_INT = INT_MAX;    // huge int value
00087 
00088 enum KMerr {KMwarn = 0, KMabort = 1};    // what to do in case of error
00089 
00090 enum StatLev {                // output statistics levels
00091     SILENT,                // no output
00092     EXEC_TIME,            // just execution time
00093     SUMMARY,            // summary of entire algorithm
00094     PHASE,                // summary of each phase
00095     RUN,                // summary of each run
00096     STAGE,                // summary of each stage
00097     STEP,                // summary of each step
00098     CENTERS,            // output centers with each step
00099     TREE,                // output tree and points
00100     N_STAT_LEVELS};            // number of levels
00101 
00102 enum KMalg {                // k-means algorithm names
00103     LLOYD,                // Lloyd's (using filtering)
00104     SWAP,                // swap heuristic
00105     HYBRID,                // hybrid algorithm
00106     EZ_HYBRID,            // EZ-hybrid algorithm
00107     RANDOM,                // random centers
00108     N_KM_ALGS};            // number of algorithms
00109 
00110 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 //  Global variables
00112 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00113 
00114 extern StatLev        kmStatLev;    // statistics output level
00115 extern ostream*        kmOut;        // standard output stream
00116 extern ostream*        kmErr;        // error output stream
00117 extern istream*        kmIn;        // input stream
00118 
00119 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 //  Printing utilities
00121 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 
00123 void kmPrintPt(                // print a point
00124     KMpoint        p,            // the point
00125     int            dim,            // the dimension
00126     bool        fancy = true);        // print plain or fancy?
00127 
00128 void kmPrintPts(            // print points
00129     string        title,            // name of point set
00130     KMpointArray    pa,            // the point array
00131     int            n,            // number of points
00132     int            dim,            // the dimension
00133     bool        fancy = true);        // print plain or fancy?
00134 
00135 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 //  Utility function declarations
00137 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 
00139 void kmError(                // error routine
00140     const string    &msg,            // error message
00141     KMerr        level);            // abort afterwards
00142 
00143 void kmExit(int x = 0);                 // exit the program
00144 
00145 #endif
